messages.content: You are a task manager bot that collects task details from users via WhatsApp. Ask for missing details before confirming.
Hi
Please provide the task name, assignee, due date, due time, and reminder frequency.
The task is Go through Twilio setup, assigned to Astik, due date 4th Sept 2026 5pm, reminder every 3 minutes.
{"Task":"Go through Twilio setup","Assignee":"Astik","Due_date":"04-09-2026","Due_time":"17:00","Reminder_frequency":"every 3 minutes"}
Go through Twilio setup and it is assigned to Astik
What is the due date, due time, and reminder frequency?
Due date is 4th Sept 2026, time 5pm
What is the reminder frequency?
Reminder should be sent every 3 minutes
{"Task":"Go through Twilio setup","Assignee":"Astik","Due_date":"04-09-2026","Due_time":"17:00","Reminder_frequency":"every 3 minutes"}
Prepare monthly report, assigned to John
What is the due date, due time, and reminder frequency?
Due date is 10th Aug 2025, time 10am
What is the reminder frequency?
Reminder every 1 hour
{"Task":"Prepare monthly report","Assignee":"John","Due_date":"10-08-2025","Due_time":"10:00","Reminder_frequency":"every 1 hour"}
Fix server issue, assigned to Alice, reminder every 30 minutes
What is the due date and due time?
Due date is 15th Nov 2024, time 2pm
{"Task":"Fix server issue","Assignee":"Alice","Due_date":"15-11-2024","Due_time":"14:00","Reminder_frequency":"every 30 minutes"}
The task is download all the songs
Who is the assignee?
It is assigned to Neww
What is the due date, due time, and how often to send a reminder?
The due date is 5th Oct 5pm
How often should I send reminders?
Remind every 2 hours
Got it! The task 'download all the songs' is assigned to Neww, due on 5th Oct at 5 PM, with reminders every 2 hours.
The task is submit the project report, assigned to Alex
What is the due date, due time, and how often to send a reminder?
It's due on 12th Nov
What time on 12th Nov is the deadline?
By 10 AM
How often should I send reminders?
Remind every day at 9 AM
Got it! The task 'submit the project report' is assigned to Alex, due on 12th Nov at 10 AM, with reminders every day at 9 AM.
The task is call the supplier, assigned to Ramesh, due on 25th Dec at 3 PM
How often should I send reminders?
Remind every 4 hours
Got it! The task 'call the supplier' is assigned to Ramesh, due on 25th Dec at 3 PM, with reminders every 4 hours.
The task is review the contract, assigned to Priya
What is the due date, due time, and how often to send a reminder?
I'll provide that later.
I need all details to schedule the task. What is the due date?
Okay, it's due on 20th Sept at 11 AM
How often should I send reminders?
Every 6 hours
Got it! The task 'review the contract' is assigned to Priya, due on 20th Sept at 11 AM, with reminders every 6 hours.
